name: Ober-Schlesien, Mittel-Schlesien, Nieder-Schlesien, Deutschland ist unsere gemeinsame Muttererde LCCN2004665978 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Ober-Schlesien, Mittel-Schlesien, Nieder-Schlesien, Deutschland ist unsere gemeinsame Muttererde Abstract: Poster shows a tree of life with the German Imperial eagle at the base and coats of arms from three main cities in Silesia -- Breslau (Wroclaw), Oppeln (Opole), and Liegnitz (Legnica). Text states that Germany is the common Mother Earth of Upper-, Middle- and Lower Silesia and encourages the people of Upper Silesia to protect the unity of Silesia by forming patriotic associations. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 60 x 45 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Adolf Münzer, 1920.; Title from item.
